title: What is Engineering Conference?
description: It is a 3 day conference which provides engineering students with a hands-on experience to solve contemporary problems through education, collaboration, and debate while investing in sustainable solutions.

title: Are there any participation fees?
description: Ticket fee is $75 per participant for all three days. UCI Engineering Conference is a non-profit event for which 33% of proceeds go to charity.

title: How can I register?
description: Registration for Engineering Conference 2020 is open now. Simply click 'Get Ticket' from the menu bar.

title: Is the conference restricted to students of a specific grade and major?
description: Not at all, we are glad to welcome all undergraduate UCI students.

title: Where will the Engineering Conference be located?
description: From Day 1 to 2, it will be located on campus at UCI Division of Continuing Education. From Day 3, it will be determined soon (we will notify you).

title: Is there free food?
description: Yes, food, drinks, performances, and workshops are provided in all three days.

title: What should I wear?
description: For men, please wear a suit, dress pants, and tie. For women, please wear a dress, or suit and dress pants.

title: Is there a chance to meet recruiters?
description: Yes, there will be a career fair during Day 3 and there will be career seeking opportunities.

title: What is taught in the workshops?
description: Depending on your committee, you will be trained how to solve real-world engineering problems and even get to publish papers.
